meanings.sent1: These stackable cups can be placed on top of each other.
meanings.sent2: The stackable chairs are convenient for saving space in small rooms.
meanings.sent3: The stackable plates played a game of Jenga when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were stackable, building upon each other to form a solid argument.
meanings.sent5: The Lego blocks were stackable, allowing for endless creative possibilities.

meanings.sent1: The stackable containers were made to fit perfectly on top of each other.
meanings.sent2: The stackable bins in the garage help keep things organized.
meanings.sent3: The stackable chairs decided to form a tower just for fun.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were stackable, forming a clear structure in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The stackable boxes were like building blocks, creating a neat storage system.

meanings.sent1: The stackable books on the shelf made it easy to find what she needed.
meanings.sent2: The stackable trays in the cafeteria make serving food more efficient.
meanings.sent3: The stackable fruits in the bowl looked like a colorful tower.
meanings.sent4: Her achievements were stackable, each one leading to the next.
meanings.sent5: The stackable chairs were like a puzzle, fitting perfectly together.
